Wed, 19 Feb 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Chris Meehan, owner of Ayrburn in Queenstown, is planning a luxury car show with multi-million dollar vehicles on display; Sally Ridge and her son Astin Parore, who is a budding supermarket business star; Jillian Friedlander, the creative director of the Friedlander Foundation, is hosting an arts and health awareness lunch to raise money for the Breast Cancer Foundation NZ.
